Our daily structure includes 'Choice Time' blocks where children exercise independence by selecting activities, which helps new children feel in control and reduces anxiety. Furthermore, each new child is assigned a 'Buddy Mentor' (a dedicated staff member) who focuses solely on supporting their emotional adjustment and ensuring smooth transitions between activities throughout the day. We hope this reassures you regarding the supportive environment we provide.
